title: ServiceAccount with Token
description: Create a ServiceAccount named ||api-sa|| in namespace ||saturn|| and retrieve its token value.

steps: kubectl get secret -n saturn | grep api-sa
kubectl get secret <secret-name> -n saturn -o jsonpath='{.data.token}' | base64 -d

validations.command: kubectl get serviceaccount api-sa -n saturn -o jsonpath='{.metadata.name}'
